titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament that no ships, bargues, or other vessels shal from henceforward make any voyage to New-castle for the fetching of coales, or any other commodity untill that towne shall be reduced into such hands as shall declare themselves for King and Parliament.
Declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament concerning coales and salt
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: An earlier edition has title: A declaration ... concerning coales and salt.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
